title: Nikola Frljužec
text:
Nikola Frljužec (born 29 July 1989 in <a href="Ptuj">Ptuj</a>) is a <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player currently playing for <a href="SV%20Lafnitz">SV Lafnitz</a>. He has previously played for <a href="NK%20Zagreb">NK Zagreb</a>, <a href="NK%20Slaven%20Belupo">NK Slaven Belupo</a>, <a href="NK%20Hrvatski%20Dragovoljac">NK Hrvatski Dragovoljac</a> and <a href="NK%20Vara%C5%BEdin%20%281931%E2%80%932015%29">NK Varazdin</a>.
Honours.
Club.
<a href="SV%20Lafnitz">SV Lafnitz</a>
